testcase.name: insertRoleTest

error.message:
SqlMapClient operation; uncategorized SQLException for SQL []; SQL state [null]; error code [0]; --- The error occurred in sqlmap/role.xml. --- The error occurred while executing update. --- Check the insert into role( name, gmt_create, gmt_modified, description ) values( ?, now(), now(), ? ) . --- Check the SQL Statement (preparation failed). --- Cause: org.apache.commons.dbcp.SQLNestedException: Cannot create PoolableConnectionFactory (Communications link failure
The last packet sent successfully to the server was 0 milliseconds ago. The driver has not received any packets from the server.); nested exception is com.ibatis.common.jdbc.exception.NestedSQLException: --- The error occurred in sqlmap/role.xml. --- The error occurred while executing update. --- Check the insert into role( name, gmt_create, gmt_modified, description ) values( ?, now(), now(), ? ) . --- Check the SQL Statement (preparation failed). --- Cause: org.apache.commons.dbcp.SQLNestedException: Cannot create PoolableConnectionFactory (Communications link failure
The last packet sent successfully to the server was 0 milliseconds ago. The driver has not received any packets from the server.)
